Reviews.Title: W838 WATCHPHONE PROBLEM
Reviews.Author: Alwill
Reviews.Content: W838 watchphone will not read my T-Moble GSM micro sim card. sellers websie did not mention that this device uses a micro sim card. i was instructed to cut my full size sim card by seller, which i did, thus damaging my full size sim card. i had to purchase a new micro sim card from T-Moble and was told that a sim card cutter must be used by T-Moble to cut sim cards down to size to fit in the supplied adapter so that the contacts will align properly in the watchphone or the sim card will not work. i have notified seller of this problem and that the micro sim card works properly in my other watchphones but not in the W838 and that T-Moble believes the watchphone may be defective. i am asking for an exchange for another W838 or a refund from the seller. other than this problem i really like the W838 watchphone because it really is waterproof as advertised and i would like to purchase 2 more from seller if i can get the micro sim card to work properly in this model of watchphone.....  Alvin Williams

Reviews.Title: I'm happy with my new watch phone.
Reviews.Author: SUTHAN
Reviews.Content: I'm happy with the shipping it was nicely pack. And the goods is in good condition and functioning well. And I wish it will have more application to get our busy life easy.

ProductInfo.Features:
Quad Band:This phone is unlocked for worldwide use. The phone supports 850/900/1800/1900 MHz. Enjoy worry-free travel wherever you go.
Mp3/Mp4:It supports MP3/WAV/3GP/MP4 format, Take the phone with you and take advantage of personalized mobile entertainment!
JAVA :Built-in Java technology means you can get the latest Apps to use on this phone. Whether for business or pleasure, this phone provides a great platform for any Java-based application you want to run.
ProductInfo.Name: Unlocked W838 Real Metal Waterproof Watch Smart Phone(bluetooth Gprs Dual Camera)
